name: 2023 ATX Boats 20 Type-S
description:
2023 ATX Boats 20 Type-S

GO BIG IN THE 20 TYPE-S

The all-new 20 Type-S can take on any sport, any water, and boats of any size. The 20 Type-S was designed and engineered to defy the perception of what a 20-footer can do. The remarkably spacious 20 Type-S delivers more value, versatility, and fun — just in a more compact package.

When you’re ready to catch the perfect wave, ride rampy wakes or throw down a slalom set, just push GO and your boat will dial in your settings. Say goodbye to complicated instructions, confusing setups, and moving people around. Loaded with 2,750 lbs of ballast, the proven performance of the Convex V Hull, and the GO System powered by TAPS 3T, your day will be epic and effortless.

When it comes to functional layouts, we became ingeniously inventive. Take a seat in our standard reverse facing seat, or give your transom a transformation with the walkthrough upgrade. No matter which you choose, you’ll be cruising in comfort.

Features may include:

TYPE-E POWERED TOWER
  • The first and only electric tower in its class, the Type-E Tower has simplicity at its core, giving you the most convenient and adaptable tower on the water.
CONVEX V HULL
  • The patented Convex V Hull allows ATX to produce a wake superior to all other inboards.
TAPS 3T
  • Just push ‘GO’ and TAPS 3T will show you a new level of surf and wake performance.
ATXPERIENCE CONTROL CENTER
  • The 7" touch screen and control center give you full control over your boat and your day.
WET SOUNDS AUDIO SYSTEMS
  • Turn up the tunes and let the good times roll with our premium Wet Sounds audio system.
RAPTOR SERIES BY INDMAR
  • The perfect balance of torque and a smooth, relaxed ride no matter how hard you push it.

name: 2023 ATX Boats 24 Type-s
description:
2022 ATX Boats 24 Type-s

LARGE AND IN CHARGE.

Large, bold, capable, and comfortable, the ATX 24 Type-S turns heads, gives you more value, and unleashes some serious swells.

When you’re ready to catch the perfect wave, just push GO and you’ll get barrels right out of the box. Versatility and simplicity are built right into its core thanks to the patented Convex V Hull, TAPS 3T, and over 3,500 lbs of ballast. 3T meaning 3 TONS of pressure, and the software behind the machine will dial in your boat for you. name: 2023 Crest Classic DLX 240 SLS
description:
2023 Crest Classic DLX 240 SLS

With deluxe features and upgrades, the Classic DLX has what you need for all-day adventures or simply enjoying the moment. Enjoy the all new soft, insulated cooler located in the bow cooler drawer that can be loaded on and off the boat to pack your favorite snacks and drinks. Keep the party going and never run out of battery with a wireless charging station at the helm. The new wrap around design along with new helm trims on our Classic DLX will have you cruising in style. Cruise, sit back and crank the music - we’ll handle the rest.

Crest’s standard performance package features two large 25” diameter tubes, a 26-gallon fuel tank, and 115 HP. This package also includes four chambers for added strength, durability, flotation, and safety.

Features may include:
  • SoftTouch Upholstery
  • Bow Cooler and Drawer
  • High Capacity Tow Bar and Accessories
  • Moveable Cup Holders
  • Midship Storage

name: 2023 Havoc Boats MSTC 1753
description:
2022 Havoc Boats MSTC 1753

The all-aluminum transom matched with our patent pending I-Beam ribs ensure maximum strength without sacrificing performance. Everywhere you see an inverted rib, there is an I-Beam rib between it and the next one. You won’t find the amount of strength and structure in the bottom of this boat anywhere else in the duck boat industry. The MSTC comes standard with both front deck storage and rear storage in the seats and trunk space. If you’re a hunter that needs to haul lots of gear deep into shallow water environments, then look no further than the MSTC.

name: 2023 Havoc Boats RDBST 1553
description:
2022 Havoc Boats RDBST 1553

The RDBST is the boat for those who want maximum performance. We took the beast mode performance of the RDB with the function of a step transom. Havoc boat owners have been asking for a model like this and we delivered. The 14° hull design allows for minimal water contact, which means low drag and more speed. Our I-Beam longitudinal ribs run the length of the boat to add exceptional strength and stability, which allows us to use lighter 80 gauge aluminum to reduce overall boat weight without sacrificing strength.

name: 2023 Tige 22RZX
description:
2023 Tige 22RZX

The 2023 22RZX.

The 22RZX gives you the power to do what you want on the water with its sharp design, state-of-the-art technology, and thrilling performance. This sporty yet luxurious addition to the RZX Class is designed to deliver a first-class experience for every rider.

Surf, ski, or wake? No problem. The 22RZX can pick up whatever you're throwing down and out-perform every other boat on the water. With top-of-the-line features, the 22RZX is in its prime. Boasting massive amounts of storage, the GO System powered by TAPS 3T, and intelligent Smart2 Wheel controls, the 22RZX is truly next-level.

Features may include:

TAPS 3T

Just push ‘GO’ and TAPS 3T will show you a new level of surf and wake performance.

CONVEX V HULL

The patented Convex V Hull allows Tige's to produce a wake superior to all other inboards.

TIGE CLEAR

The next-generation of on-board technology that's sure to elevate everything about your experience in a Tige.

RAPTOR SERIES BY INDMAR

More power, more torque and better fuel economy than any other engine on the market.

AUDISON PRO-AUDIO SYSTEM

Turn up the tunes and let the good times roll with our all-new Audison Pro-Audio System.

ALPHA E3 TOWER

Precision has never been this powerful in engineering, strength, and design.

2023 Tige 24RZX

The 2023 24RZX.

Expand your expectations with the 24RZX. Exuding confidence, its razor edge design is complemented by its distinct lines and lush diamond stitching. With a culmination of our latest advancements, the 24RZX goes big, not just in size but in performance, versatility, luxury, storage, and freeboard. If you crave power, state-of-the-art technology, and want to stand out - the 24RZX is the boat for you.

The 24RZX is a thrilling union of sport and luxury. When you’re ready to GO Wake, your 24RZX will adjust accordingly, and you will be riding clean, tall wakeboard wakes within seconds. name: 2023 Tige Z3
description:
2022 Tige Z3

THE 2022 Z3.

The all-new Z3 returns to represent Tige’s 30 years of innovation and honors its history of being the best-selling Tige of all time. Pro athletes, families, and beginners have found wake making perfection behind the Z3 for years. It set the bar for how a boat should perform and quite literally shaped the sport of wake surfing.

The new Z3 carries the traditional styling of the original model but takes on a modern touch. Seamlessly sculpted with Tige’s renowned diamond-stitched interior and all of the essentials for your day on the water, the Z3 will deliver the good times whether you’re behind the wheel or behind the boat. Just touch GO and the all-new Z3 is guaranteed to show you why this legend deserves a comeback.

name: 2023 Trifecta 20C CS 25"
description:
2022 Trifecta 20C CS 25"

For a feature rich entry-level pontoon that isn't entry-level, check out the Trifecta C-Series. Compare to anyone else's pontoon & you will find the yardstick we use is ours exclusively. Quality construction incorporating many of the same applications and materials found in our top of the line models are utilized in this series. Spacious 10 foot bimini tops, 16" on-center cross members, Bluetooth compatible stereo and many more items you may find in the options column on other brands are all standard on our C-Series boats.

Features may include:

  • (4) Speakers w/ Protective Inside Covers
  • 27 Gallon, Direct Fill, Fuel Tank in Motor Pod w/ Fuel / Water Separator
  • 3/4" One Piece V-Lite Performance Deck
  • Bimini Top Trailering Brackets
  • Bow Reinforcement Bumper & Continuous Extruded Aluminum Riser Brackets
  • Deutsch Waterproof Electrical Wiring Harness
  • Extended Stern Platform w/ SS Telescoping Ladder
  • Oval Shaped Silver Matte Table

name: 2023 Trifecta 20C LE 25"
description:

name: 2023 Xcursion Pontoons 263 RFX
description:
2021 Xcursion Pontoons 263 RFX

RFX HIGHLIGHTS

RFX layout maximizes seating and lounging with it’s perimeter furniture layout. This open layout is perfect for small and large parties.

name: 2022 MB Sports B52 23 Alpha

The MB sports B52 series was specifically designed in the early 90's for wakeboarding enthusiasts demanding more on the water. Using our unique deep v hull, we've been able to crossover into the wakesurf market to provide the best of both worlds. MB sports continues to make waves in the marketplace with the introduction of the MB switch system and our quick fill ballast. Wakeboard to wakesurf is as easy as pushing a button.

name: 2022 Tige Z1
description:
2022 Tige Z1

Z1 AND ONLY

Returning to its legendary lineage, the Z1 is back and ready to deliver on its reputation. With its traditional bow, Tige’s iconic diamond stitching, and a deeper freeboard, the Z1 is designed to give you the Tige performance you expect. The new Z1 packs everything you love about the Z3 into a sleek and nimble 21’ package, without sacrificing on the space you need for a memorable day on the water.

The Z1’s sharp design comes with immense skill - you will be riding ocean-worthy waves, rampy wakes, or flat slalom wakes that round out complete versatility. When you’re ready to GO, so is your Z1. At the push of a button, you can dial in your sport of choice whether it’s wakesurfing, wakeboarding, or skiing.

Features may include:
  • TAPS 3T

  • CONVEX V HULL

  • TIGE CLEAR

  • ALPHA M2 TOWER

Have a signature style and a strong presence of Tige all the way across the lake.

  • RAPTOR SERIES BY INDMAR

  • WET SOUNDS AUDIO SYSTEM

name: 2022 Tige Z3
description:
2022 Tige Z3

THE 2022 Z3.

The all-new Z3 returns to represent Tige’s 30 years of innovation and honors its history of being the best-selling Tige of all time. Pro athletes, families, and beginners have found wake making perfection behind the Z3 for years. It set the bar for how a boat should perform and quite literally shaped the sport of wake surfing.

The new Z3 carries the traditional styling of the original model but takes on a modern touch. Seamlessly sculpted with Tige’s renowned diamond-stitched interior and all of the essentials for your day on the water, the Z3 will deliver the good times whether you’re behind the wheel or behind the boat. Just touch GO and the all-new Z3 is guaranteed to show you why this legend deserves a comeback.

name: 2022 Tige ZX Class 21 ZX
description:
2021 Tige ZX Class 21 ZX

The 21ZX is the perfect boat to serve up great days and even greater memories. Boasting a deep freeboard, tons of storage, and the largest bow and cockpit space in the segment, the 21ZX packs everything you love about big boats into a convenient 21' package.

Features may include:

TAPS 3T
  • Built on years of success, TAPS 3T was engineered with the most effective and forward thinking technology available. TAPS 3T and the natural performance of the CONVEX V HULL forms the longest, most perfect and powerful surf wave on either side of the boat.
  • The TAPS 3T exclusive plate designs utilize military grade actuators that withstand over 3 tons of pressure, giving you more reliability than any other surf system on the market. TAPS 3T was tested down to the millimeter so that it will deliver consistent waves, set after set.
Convex V Hull
  • Tige's masterfully engineered Convex V Hull and TAPS technology makes Tige the first and only inboard to feature full trim capability.
  • Versatility is at the heart of every Tige model. Only with a Tige will you experience the most powerful wave and most push found anywhere between the oceans, the biggest wakes for wakeboarding, and the most accessible slalom set with your family and friends in tow.
Tige Clear
  • The Tige Clear User Experience is the next-generation of on-board technology and is sure to elevate everything about your boating experience. UWith the largest surface area, brightest screen, and clear forward visibility, you can easily navigate through your day on the water with highly intelligent design, intuitive control, and always a clear view ahead.
  • With the largest surface area, brightest screen, and clear forward visibility, the 11" intuitive interface allows you to easily access all the action on a tablet style that you're already accustomed to.
Alpha E2 Tower
  • The Alpha E2 Powered Tower has made an electric statement in technology, design, and versatility, so the award of INNOVATION OF THE YEAR speaks for itself. The voters chose the Alpha E2 Powered Tower as their favorite product over hundreds of other new innovations introduced to the market in the past 12 months.
  • Precision has never been this powerful. With the push of a button, the Alpha E2 lowers by electronic actuator to windshield height, effortlessly making your Tige the perfect fit.
Raptor Series By Indmar
  • The closed cooled Raptor Series’ customized torque ratio is specifically designed to work hand in hand with our patented Convex V Hull. This allows your Tige to run at a lower RPM, resulting in up to a 33% increase in fuel economy, less noise, smoother cruising, less maintenance, and more prop range.
  • The 6.2-liter V8 engine, the same powering the world’s most reliable and best selling F-150 SVT Raptor and F-Series Super Duty trucks, is sure to make you feel acceleration in more than just your heart rate.
Wet Sounds Audio System
  • To sound the best, you must offer the best. That’s why we have partnered with the industry’s leading manufacturer of marine audio equipment, Wet Sounds, to elevate your experience.
  • Tige’s Wet Sounds™ Sinister power amps, 8" interior speakers, and Tige10 exclusive tower speakers will come pre-tuned and deliver the good times in concert quality, whether your chosen source is radio or Bluetooth.

name: 2022 Vexus AVX1980
description:
2022 Vexus AVX1980

About This Model

From its uncompromising stance and head-turning good looks to its tournament-bred engineering and incredibly-long list of standard features, the aluminum AVX1980 is so evolved it’s often mistaken as a hand-built fiberglass design. Built on a ground-breaking, high performance pad hull, this 19’ 10” rig enjoys a broad 95” beam, quick hole shots, responsive handling, and an exceptionally smooth ride. Inside, the 1980 is loaded with an equally impressive set of advantages. Smooth, stretch-formed gunnels deliver an advanced look and even more interior room. Likewise, the massive decks are inundated with storages so large they literally dwarf other aluminum designs. You’ll see it in the 8 ½ foot center rod locker, vast gear compartments, spacious rear power compartment, and the extra leg room at the console.

SeaStar™ Pro hydraulic steering centers the helm, complemented by a full array of electronics and instrumentation. Custom-contoured cockpit seating includes a choice of personalized configurations including a center storage box and step, folding center seat and step, or open step. An adjustable driver’s seat and remote drain plug control are also available. On the rear deck, the tournament-grade fiberglass livewell is engineered with recirculating aeration, auto fill valve (no leaky standpipe to set and remove), pump-out, and anti-splash ring. Further aft, our Vector Force™ transom is built to absorb the added shock and weight from today’s heavier outboards, shallow water anchors, and other stern-mounted gear. Bow to stern, the entire design is engineered for a superior level of comfort, confidence, and attention to detail.

With so many best-and-first-in-class features, this Glass-Infused Aluminum Hybrid™ offers more space, more performance, more innovation, and more real-world advantages. Plus, it’s available with your choice of precision-matched outboards. The AVX1980. With its custom-built trailer, Dense-Base™ design, Hard Case™ paint, and Trac Tight™ handling, this is a seriously-equipped tournament rig that looks, feels, and performs like glass – all at a fraction of the price.

Features may include:

Performance And Engineering
  • Available with Power of Choice Professionally Rigged Outboards
  • All-welded AVX High Performance Hull
  • Vector Force™ Solid Transom
Handcrafted Details
  • Hard Case™ Paint with Clear Coat Protection
  • Glass-Infused Aluminum Hybrid Design
  • Stretch-Form Gunnels
Advanced Electronics
  • Wide Variety of Custom Factory-Rigged Electronics
  • 6 Gauge Trolling Motor Wiring
  • Minn Kota Fortrex 80 45" Trolling Motor
Comfort And Convenience
  • Custom-contoured High Performance Bucket Seats with (2) Fold-down Fishing Seats
  • Oversized Fiberglass Storage Boxes with Raised Lip Dam and Weather Trim Seal.
  • Wide Open Spacious Interior
Trailer
  • 4" Channel Frame
  • 14" Aluminum Wheels with Radial Tires
  • Skid-resistant Step Pads

name: 2021 ATX Boats 24 TYPE-S
description:
2021 ATX Boats 24 TYPE-S

LARGE AND IN CHARGE.

Imagine a boat that delivers wake performance in a league of its own. A boat that is downright sporty, at the top of the game, and dominates in the water. The ATX 24 Type-S is all that and delivers the most boat for the buck on the whole market.

The 24 Type-S puts a premium on performance and simplicity on versatility. When you’re ready to GO, so is your ATX. Ride ocean-worthy waves, rampy wakes, or throw down a slalom set at just the push of a button. The GO System powered by TAPS 3T will have you riding in seconds. TAPS 3T, meaning 3 tons of pressure, the patented Convex V Hull, and 3,750 pounds of ballast will ensure that your day on the water is epic and effortless.

When it comes to functional layouts, we became ingeniously inventive. Take a seat in our standard reverse facing seat, or give your transom a transformation with the walkthrough upgrade. No matter which you choose, you’ll be cruising in comfort.

Features may include:

SHOCK TOWER
  • ATX’s gas shock assisted tower is next level in strength and functionality.
CONVEX V HULL
  • The patented Convex V Hull allows ATX to produce a wake superior to all other inboards.
TAPS 3T
  • Just push ‘GO’ and TAPS 3T will show you a new level of surf and wake performance.
ATXPERIENCE CONTROL CENTER
  • The 7" touch screen and control center give you full control over your boat and your day.
AUDIO SYSTEM
  • Turn up the tunes and let the good times roll with our premium Wet Sounds audio system.
ATX 6.2L CLOSED COOLED
  • The perfect balance of torque and a smooth, relaxed ride no matter how hard you push it.

name: 2021 Nautique Super Air Nautique G23
description:
2021 Nautique Super Air Nautique G23

Building upon the dynasty that Nautique created almost a decade ago when the G23 was first introduced, the all-new G23 is set to reinforce its reign as the best wakesurf and wakeboard boat ever created. Our engineers have taken developmental leaps with the wake and wave shaping capabilities in order to produce this marvel of design and performance. With breathtaking looks and refined amenities, this next-generation G23 looks stunning on the water while delivering the best wakesurf wave and wakeboard wakes the world has ever seen. The reinvented G23 is ready to alter the course of wake boats once again.

Features may include:

AGGRESSIVE STYLING ANDTIMELESS NAUTIQUE LOOKS

A continuation of the signature Nautique aesthetic, the all-new G23 brings together the overall look and feel that the Ski Nautique and G23 Paragon have brought to the line-up. The faceted hull sides, aggressive styling and timeless Nautique looks also bring a load of appealing features.

WINDSHIELD

The completely redesigned G23 comes with a brand-new windshield to compliment it’s exterior aesthetic. Providing the driver with a clear view of their surroundings, this automotive-inspired windshield takes cues from the exterior of the G23 and continues those lines giving the entire boat a well thought-out, integrated look.

BIMINI

The bimini aboard the G23 is the perfect companion to those hot summer days. With surfboard storage on top, this bimini has utilitarian roots while complimenting the look and feel of the all-new G23. Wide coverage from the elements, utilize this option to keep your crew happy during a full day on the water.

KEEPING EVERYTHING THEDRIVER NEEDS WITHIN REACH

The all-new G23 takes on the asymmetrical design that Nautique has been on the forefront of and taken it one step further. Clear visibility of the water and the LINC Panoray touchscreen are evident, while keeping everything the driver needs within reach. A phone pocket doubles as a place to keep your drain plug when your boat is out of the water, and a large open dash area is the ideal place for hats and other accessories.

BOW

The bow of the G23 is an amazing place to spend a hot summer day. Two comfortable lounge seats with armrests on either side fill out the sides of the bow. Flip up the seats for a storage underneath and utilize the cupholders in various places around the bow. JL Audio® speakers keep the vibe alive in the bow as well, with it’s own zone for your lounging comfort.

JL AUDIO® STEREO

The Super Air Nautique G23 comes standard with the complete JL Audio M6 Series Elite stereo package with DSP technology. This includes the JL Audio MM100s head unit, 6 JL Audio M6 speakers throughout the boat, one 10” subwoofer and an 8-channel amplifier. Opt up to the Studio Elite package that includes two 12” subwoofers, the JL Audio Wavefront™ and a JL Audio Monoblock Amplifier.

name: 2021 Tige ZX Class 23 ZX
description:
2021 Tige ZX Class 23 ZX

Load up your family and friends and share the stoke of next-gen styling, luxury, and now, easier-than-ever performance with the GO System. Packed with ingenious storage, thoughtful details, and massive performance, the 23ZX is sized and styled perfectly to take over the best-selling length segment of the inboard market.

Features may include:

TAPS 3T
  • Built on years of success, TAPS 3T was engineered with the most effective and forward thinking technology available. TAPS 3T and the natural performance of the CONVEX V HULL forms the longest, most perfect and powerful surf wave on either side of the boat.
  • The TAPS 3T exclusive plate designs utilize military grade actuators that withstand over 3 tons of pressure, giving you more reliability than any other surf system on the market. TAPS 3T was tested down to the millimeter so that it will deliver consistent waves, set after set.
Convex V Hull
  • Tige's masterfully engineered Convex V Hull and TAPS technology makes Tige the first and only inboard to feature full trim capability.
  • Versatility is at the heart of every Tige model. Only with a Tige will you experience the most powerful wave and most push found anywhere between the oceans, the biggest wakes for wakeboarding, and the most accessible slalom set with your family and friends in tow.
Tige Clear
  • The Tige Clear User Experience is the next-generation of on-board technology and is sure to elevate everything about your boating experience. UWith the largest surface area, brightest screen, and clear forward visibility, you can easily navigate through your day on the water with highly intelligent design, intuitive control, and always a clear view ahead.
  • With the largest surface area, brightest screen, and clear forward visibility, the 11" intuitive interface allows you to easily access all the action on a tablet style that you're already accustomed to.
Alpha E2 Tower
  • The Alpha E2 Powered Tower has made an electric statement in technology, design, and versatility, so the award of INNOVATION OF THE YEAR speaks for itself. The voters chose the Alpha E2 Powered Tower as their favorite product over hundreds of other new innovations introduced to the market in the past 12 months.
  • Precision has never been this powerful. With the push of a button, the Alpha E2 lowers by electronic actuator to windshield height, effortlessly making your Tige the perfect fit.
Raptor Series By Indmar
  • The closed cooled Raptor Series’ customized torque ratio is specifically designed to work hand in hand with our patented Convex V Hull. This allows your Tige to run at a lower RPM, resulting in up to a 33% increase in fuel economy, less noise, smoother cruising, less maintenance, and more prop range.
  • The 6.2-liter V8 engine, the same powering the world’s most reliable and best selling F-150 SVT Raptor and F-Series Super Duty trucks, is sure to make you feel acceleration in more than just your heart rate.
Wet Sounds Audio System
  • To sound the best, you must offer the best. That’s why we have partnered with the industry’s leading manufacturer of marine audio equipment, Wet Sounds, to elevate your experience.
  • Tige’s Wet Sounds™ Sinister power amps, 8" interior speakers, and Tige10 exclusive tower speakers will come pre-tuned and deliver the good times in concert quality, whether your chosen source is radio or Bluetooth.

name: 2020 Premier Gemini 220

Fishing, swimming, or cruising the Gemini has your needs covered. The Gemini features spacious front seating, a captains station with two angler fishing chairs and a live well. Our signature soft touch furniture, standard round table, cup holders in couch, cell phone holder and other features are sure to impress.

The Gemini was created to be a great all around boat capable of handling a variety of activities .


This model comes standard with aluminum corner casting, navigation lights, telescoping ladder, and our straight bimini. It also is well equipped with our 28 gallon fuel tank, swift wheel, tilt steering, and side storage panel.

Everyone has something to do aboard the Gemini, where a variety of family fun activities are possible: fishing, swimming, and cruising.
